sn48.6:1: "Bhikkhus, there are these five faculties. What five? The faculty of faith â€¦ the faculty of wisdom.
sn48.6:2: "But, bhikkhus, those ascetics and brahmins who understand these things: these I consider to be ascetics among ascetics and brahmins among brahmins, and these venerable ones, by realizing it for themselves with direct knowledge, in this very life enter and dwell in the goal of asceticism and the goal of brahminhood."
